INSERT INTO `t_sms`(user_id, `code`,isvalid,create_time,update_time) VALUES(#{userId}, #{code}, 1, now(), now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE isvalid = 1, update_time = now()
mapper.update: update `t_sms` SET isvalid = 0, update_time = now() WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND `code`=#{code}
mapper.select: select s.*,u.username from `t_sms` s join t_user u on s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.isvalid = 1
